price: Those who disbelieve say, “What! Is it that when we and our forefathers become dust, will we really be brought forth [alive]?
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ أَءِذَا كُنَّا تُرَٰبٗا وَءَابَآؤُنَآ أَئِنَّا لَمُخۡرَجُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
